changeSet.author: lhj

changeSet.sql: UPDATE S_COMMON_SEQ_CNT SET SQ_TABLE_NM = ('S'||SUBSTR(SQ_TABLE_NM,2)) WHERE SQ_TABLE_NM IN ( 'T_MENU_MANAGER' ,'T_COMMON_CODE_MAIN' ,'T_COMMON_CODE_SUB' ,'T_COMMON_FILE_MAIN' ,'T_COMMON_FILE_SUB' ,'T_COMMON_SEQ_CNT' ,'T_HOME_AUTHORITY_MANAGER' ,'T_HOME_MANAGER' ,'T_MENU_VIEW_DATA' ,'T_MENU_VIEW_DATA_HISTORY' ,'T_RESOURCES_MANAGER_HISTORY' ,'T_RESOURCES_MANAGER_SUB' ,'T_SITE_MANAGER' ,'T_RESOURCES_MANAGER' )

changeSet.author: lhj
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW CTCMS.AUTHORITY_VIEW (LEV,URL,AUTHORITY) AS SELECT "LEV","URL","AUTHORITY" FROM ( SELECT A.USR_ORDER LEV , NVL( CASE WHEN D.MN_PAGEDIV_C = 'SC_QXCFB' THEN D.MN_URL || '/**' ELSE D.MN_URL END,A.USR_PATTERN) AS URL, C.UIA_NAME AS AUTHORITY FROM U_USERINFO_SECURED_RESOURCE A LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_RESOURCE_AUTHORITY B ON A.USR_KEYNO = B.USR_KEYNO LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_AUTHORITY C ON B.UIA_KEYNO = C.UIA_KEYNO LEFT JOIN S_MENU_MANAGER D ON A.USR_MN_KEYNO = D.MN_KEYNO WHERE A.USR_KEYNO = B.USR_KEYNO AND (D.MN_DEL_YN IS NULL OR D.MN_DEL_YN = 'N') AND A.USR_UIR_KEYNO = 'UIR_0000000019' ORDER BY A.USR_ORDER ) AA WHERE AA.URL IS NOT NULL
